Flying
When Specter of Crosis enters, choose a card name. Target player exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a card with that name. If they do, you may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell. Otherwise, that player shuffles the exiled cards into their library.
[i](Melds with Urborg Butcher)[/i]

Whenever Bane of the Burning Isles attacks or dies, each opponent loses 6 life, discards two cards, and sacrifices two permanents.
